mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MovieLens.links (movieId, imdbId, tmdbId) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{imdbId}, #{tmdbId});
INSERT INTO MovieLens.movies (movieId, title, genres, year) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{title}, #{genres}, #{year});
INSERT INTO MovieLens.tags (userId, movieId, tag, timestamp) VALUES (#{userId}, #{movieId}, #{tag}, #{timestamp}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `timestamp` = #{timestamp};

INSERT INTO MovieLens.genome_scores_#{suffix} (movieId, tagId, relavance) VALUES
(#{item.movieId}, #{item.tagId}, #{item.relavance})
